item.title: Today's Prayer
item.description: June 27, 2024 Today's Verse Psalm 46:1â€“3 To the choirmaster. Of the Sons of Korah. According to Alamoth. A Song. [1] God is our refuge and strength, a very present help in trouble. [2] Therefore we will not fear though the earth gives way, though the mountains be moved into the heart of the sea, [3] though its waters roar and foam, though the mountains tremble at its swelling. Selah This Year's Memory Verse Review Isaiah 40:28 - Have you not known?
